import React, { useState,useEffect } from "react"; import {fetchStudents1,fetchStudents2,fetchStudents3,fetchStudents4,addStudents,updateStudents,deleteStudents } from "../Utilis/handleStuBorrowers"; // import "../Style/AllBooks.css"; import "../Style/Students.css"; function Students() { const [USN, setUsn] = useState(""); const [Name, setName] = useState(""); const [Year, setYear] = useState(""); const [Email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [Book_id, setBookid] = useState(""); const [isUpdating, setIsUpdating] = useState(false); const [students1, setStudents1] = useState([]); const [students2, setStudents2] = useState([]); const [students3, setStudents3] = useState([]); const [students4, setStudents4] = useState([]); const handleAdd = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const newStudent = { USN: USN, Name: Name, Year: Year, Email: Email, Book_id: Book_id, }; await addStudents(newStudent); }; useEffect(() => { fetchStudents1(setStudents1); }, []); useEffect(()=>{ fetchStudents2(setStudents2); },[]); useEffect(()=>{ fetchStudents3(setStudents3); },[]); useEffect(()=>{ fetchStudents4(setStudents4); },[]); const Update = async(USN,Name,Year,Email,Book_id)=>{ setUsn(USN); setName(Name); setYear(Year); setEmail(Email); setBookid(Book_id); setIsUpdating(true); } const handleUpdate = async (e) => { // e.preventDefault(); const updateStudent = { USN:USN, Name:Name, Year:Year, Email:Email, Book_id:Book_id }; updateStudents(USN,updateStudent); setIsUpdating(false); } const handleDelete = async (USN,Year) => { const confirmDelete = window.confirm( "Are you sure you want to delete this student?" ); if (confirmDelete) { try { await deleteStudents(USN); fetchStudents+(setBooks); } catch (error) { console.error("Error deleting book: ", +error); } } }; return (

)}

); } export default Students;
